characterDescription:
Yixli is the spren who leads Sah, Vai, Khen, and Kaladin - amongst others - to Revolar.
She is, apparently, one of many spren that appear and guide the newly awakened singers to Kholinar.

characterDetails.Appearance: Yixli appears as a tiny woman who is the yellow-white color of the center of a flame, standing on a translucent pillar of golden stone. She wears a flowing dress that covers her legs entirely. Her face is shaped oddly narrow, but with large, childlike eyes, similar to those of someone from Shinovar.
characterDetails.Abilities: Yixli has a similar level of control over who sees her (as a honorspren does), though she doesn't appear to need a Nahel bond to maintain her mind while in the Physical Realm.[citation needed]
